reviews.sentence: great hotel experience. It was just very pleasant not fancy but bery clean and they had a small resturant but food was excellent and you got large portions.

Outstanding value. We chose this motel for the free airport shuttle and the price. It was a great value. The property was clean and inviting in a newer neighborhood and the service was outstanding. We have stayed at more expensive Sacramento airport motels that were not nearly as nice. Highly recommend based on our experience.

Convenient to the airport. Nice staff. Pleasant stay and surroundings. I would have wished for a microwave in the room. In lieu of this any item to be heated had to be run down four flights to the room of the front desk. Otherwise very nice hotel.

Comfortable and clean. Most of our experience was positive here. The staff were friendly the hotel is clean and the beds are comfortable. I was not happy that when I was told there was breakfast I was not told it was 11 per person. And the towels are poor quality. Otherwise very good.

I have stayed at this hotel before and had an ok experience. My only complaint this time was the noise level. We could hear everything going on in the hallways at 1 AM as well as the conversation going on either next door or upstairs. I was also a little surprised that there was no refrigerator in the room.
CAF Lakers fan. My wife is very particular about hotels and she loved the experience. Good job.
Very nice clean and professional atmosphere.

WORST EXPERIENCE. The first room that we checked into the bathroom door was not attached and was just although no against the wall. Then we moved rooms. In this room the toilet did not work so we had to go down to the first floor anytime we needed to use a toilet. We ate at the restaurant down stairs and the garlic Fries were extremely undercoked and cold frozen type. French fries with just a little garlic powder on them. I refused to pay for them. I have stayed at many hotels and motels and this is by far the worst experience I have ever had and would not recommend anyone to stay here.
Went there for a birthday party on the hall they rent out. Was great overall experience.
Close to Airport. I needed hotel near the airport. Was pleased with all aspects of hotel and staff.

The most horrible hotel experience we have had. It was horrible. Dirty unfriendly and not functional but it was beautiful on the outside. It was a horrible experience. We did not get the room we reserved there was a huge sopping mess of unknown liquid in the carpet the walls and bathroom was filthy appliances did not work and they were rude and angry when we asked for a clean functional room. I would rather sleep in my vehicle than ever stay there again.

GREAT FOR NEARBY AIRPORT HOTEL. I m writing this review as a traveller who lives in this greater area but always spends the nite before travelling in a hotel near sacto international airport. our flites are usually very early flights. We ve stayed at several hotels in this area. These rooms are a bit larger thn the others. The hotel is immaculate. as i would expect of a Sheraton. Front staff are very cordial had good knowledge of road and driving issues to the airport. The overall ambiance of the hotel is a step above the others in the area. In summary. friendly knowledgeable staff spotless attractive rooms. lotsa towels a bigie for me.

do not stay here. This was undoubtedly my worst SPG experience. Strike one the water in my shower did not get hot. I made a call to the lobby and waited. After waiting 30 minutes I had to just deal with a cold shower and get on with my day. I stopped by the lobby on my way out and requested a room change. I was given new room keys and was told to leave my belongings with the lobby personnel since my new room was not clean yet. After a long day I came back to the hotel tried to get in my new room and the key did not work. I headed back to the lobby to be told I had already checked out. Luckily there was still a room available so all seemed good. Strike two we had to request a fridge in our room. My roommate is diabetic and she needed to keep her insulin cold. Strange enough that not all rooms have fridges but ok. We waited and waited and no fridge came so insulin was kept in an ice bucket. Along the way we also requested extra towels they took over an hour but eventually came. The cups we requested never did. Strike three on both mornings we were woken up before 8 am by housekeeping. On the second day we failed to lock the latch and housekeeping actually came into the room. In my experience hotels provide housekeeping staff with a list of the empty rooms but not this one. I was told by the lobby staff that housekeeping does not KNOW which rooms are still occupied and they have to go to every one. I am not new at this hotel thing I know to leave the do not disturb on the door handle if I want to sleep in but it was not even 8 am. Sacramento Four Points management you need to get it together. you have lost my business for good.
I had very bad experiences with this hotel specially with one of the staff in front desk. She was very rude and not professional.
It was a great experience at Four Points. Cleanness comfort friendly staff and location. I am not sure.

Never Again. I booked a parking package and got charged extra for parking the room had no soap shower gel or conditioner in the dispensers. The internet was so slow I could not connect. I was overcharged and then double charged. The front desk staff was rude and to top it off the general manager was rude when I called to complain. The experience and the customer service I received afterward was so poor that not only will I never stay at this particular property again. I will never stay at ANY Sheraton property again. Mariot is in the process of acquiring Sheraton. Hopefully this will make a difference. Do yourself a favor save yourself a headache and find ANY OTHER place to stay.

I will sleep in my car and bathe in the river before I ever even consider trading a single hard earned dollar for the horrible experience they offered. Read the Yelp reviews before you book this property. I wish I had paid more attention and not just trusted the Sheraton brand name. Probably some of the worst polices and customer service that I ’ve ever experienced.
Hotel was beautiful and trendy. The only thing I wish it had was a small refrigerator in the room. Overall though great experience I will be staying there again.

This is literally the worst hotel experience I ’ve ever had. Made a reservation 3 weeks in advance told them we ’d be getting in after 1 am. Payed in advance even confirmed it over the phone. Got here they gave our room away AND I had to pay the full amount AGAIN. I WILL NEVER RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL TO ANYBODY. If I was n’t stuck in LA without a car at 2AM I would n’t have stayed. DO NOT book with or stay at this hotel.

My wife left two pairs of expensive jeans in the closet and we called back a day or two later after leaving and flying to our destination. The first gal we spoke to said she checked with the cleaning crew for us and that nothing was found in the room. Well we knew they were there. The lady told us she ’d check again and give us a call in the next few hours. A few days went by and I called back to follow up. The lady on the phone this time may have been a different gal checked on it for us and told us the pants were found and they were given to one of the employees family members. NOT COOL. I mentioned we called in shortly after we left and we ’re told nothing was found. so what ’s going on. No explanation but were told they ’d be ready for us to pick up when we retuned. Upon getting them back they had obviously been worn washed and dried in a dryer. Fabric was ruined a bit the pants shrunk and they smelled “ used ”. These two pairs of pants were over 150 each and brand new had n’t been worn once before this experience. I know this ca nt be normal policy but very shady practice here makes me wonder how often this location ’s workers help themselves to other people ’s property assuming if it ’s left behind its up for grabs. what a great perk. Good location decent rooms but nothing special for the price paid. Also careful about changing your mind missing getting in on time as they have the most strict cancellation policies 100 of the room charge 48 hours in advance. You could call in a couple days ahead of time to change booking and they ’l still charge you full price for the room. might as well keep it rather than cancel at that point. Breakfast was just ok. Buffet cost extra and was dry. I travel regularly for work and am an SPG member with this hotel chain and its partners this is the worst experience I ’ve seen had in 6 years. Too bad it was with my wife. had it just been me on a work trip it likely would have been more tolerable. Best experience was the shuttle service.

Danger Will Robinson Danger. I was flying out of Sacramento International at 530 am the next morning so I decided to take advantage of Four Points stay park and fly package. I would NEVER recommend doing that. I came back after a seven day trip to find my truck had been broken into and a duflebag of clothing and toiletries stolen from the back of my extended cab. The clothing was what I was wearing the day before I flew out so the value was not that great. I now have the hassle of having to replace the door lock on my truck. The thieves had popped the lock on the drivers side to gain entrance. Strangely they did not take anything of real value like my garage door opener or a lug wrench. A police officer was sitting across the parking lot filling out reports so I filed a report through him. He said my truck was the second vehicle of the week that he knew of to be broken into at the Four Points. The hotel does have vacant lots on one side and a dark strip center to the south. Regardless if you are staying over night or park a vehicle for a week it is sitting there all night long without adequate security measures. The room itself was not bad but my experience with the vehicle break in soured me on the property.

I had scheduled it for Sunday Monday and not noticing the reservation came back Saturday Sunday. So I had to use my Mariot card for the room. Secondly the showers continually rotated from scalding hot to temperate without being able to adjust. Overall a bad experience to pay for a room I could n’t use and pay again for the same room.
